article_title: First lady Michelle Obama photobombs the Miami Heat with a thundering slam dunk
article_text:
Topics: Dwyane Wade, Erik Spoelstra, gif, LeBron James, let's move, Miami Heat, Michelle Obama, NBA, SB Nation, Entertainment News, News, Politics News

Beyond accepting President Obama’s congratulations for winning their second-straight NBA championship, the Miami Heat visited the White House last week in order to film a commercial for first lady Michelle Obama’s Let’s Move! campaign.

That’s basically all the background you need to understand this awesome GIF (via SB Nation) of the first lady throwing down on LeBron James — and photobombing Dwyane Wade, Ray Allen and Heat coach Erik Spoelstra in the process.

The first lady’s got game, and judging by her post-dunk mugging, she knows it.

Check out the GIF below:

article_metadata.description: The president is hardly the only resident of the White House who's got game
